Solitaire games have been around for more than a century and are still popular among people of all ages. Although there are many solitaire games available online, 123 Free Solitaire stands out as one of the best free solitaire games for computer users.

## What is 123 Free Solitaire?

123 Free Solitaire is a popular freeware card game collection available for Windows computers. It was developed by TreeCardGames and has been around since 2003. The game collection includes 12 freeware solitaire games with different variations, such as Klondike, Spider, FreeCell, Pyramid, and many others.

## Features

### Variety of Solitaire Games

123 Free Solitaire offers 12 different solitaire games that provide endless hours of entertainment, and they are all free to play. Some of the popular games included are:

- Klondike
- Spider
- FreeCell
- Pyramid
- Golf
- Forty Thieves

### Customizable Options

One of the best features of 123 Free Solitaire is its ability to customize the gameplay. Players can customize the card backs, backgrounds, and deck styles to suit their preferences. The gameâ€™s settings are easy to navigate, and even beginners can effortlessly change the gameplay features.

### Easy-to-Use Interface

The game collection has a user-friendly interface that is easy to navigate. The graphics are simple and attractive, and each game variant comes with a short description to help players understand the rules.

### Smooth Gameplay

123 Free Solitaire has smooth and responsive gameplay that is both relaxing and entertaining. The cards move effortlessly between the columns, and players have the option to undo any move they make.

## Compatibility

123 Free Solitaire is compatible with Microsoft Windows 10, 8, 7, Vista, and XP. The game collection is also available as a mobile app on the App Store and Google Play for iOS and Android devices.

## Conclusion

123 Free Solitaire remains a top choice for solitaire fans who are looking for a free and customizable solitaire card game. With a variety of games and customizable options, it has become a staple entertainment source on many Windows computers. Whether you need some relaxation or just want to kill time, 123 Free Solitaire is the perfect option to enjoy a game of solitaire.
